author: hdu
msg: #i93128# was fixed so the auto test ValidityDialogSetting::testAllowLessThanTextLength() can be reenabled

author: ggregory
msg: Rename ivars that were in the past tense to use the imperative style.

author: markt
msg: Utilise underlying read buffer rather than trying to read the exact number of bytes. This is more efficient for HTTP and required for HTTPS since it is not possible to unwrap a single byte.

author: olegk
msg: HTTPCLIENT-1248: make a copy of the original request when creating a redirect request for status 307
